titles.title: Export Extension Act of 2001
Export Extension Act of 2001
To extend the Export Administration Act until April 20, 2002.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Committee Agreed to Seek Consideration Under Suspension of the Rules, by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Mr. Royce moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H.R. 3189.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 249.

bill.summary: 11/27/2001--Passed House without amendment. Export Extension Act of 2001 - Amends the Export Administration Act of 1979 to extend its export control authority through April 20, 2002.
